thread.title: Nerve agent used in attempted murder of ex-Russian spy: UK police

title: Nerve agent used in attempted murder of ex-Russian spy: UK police
text:
Nerve agent used in attempted murder of ex-Russian spy: UK police 1:58am IST - 00:38 
British police are treating an incident in which a Russian ex-spy and his daughter fell critically ill as attempted murder by administration of a nerve agent, the head of counter terrorism policing said on Wednesday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
British police are treating an incident in which a Russian ex-spy and his daughter fell critically ill as attempted murder by administration of a nerve agent, the head of counter terrorism policing said on Wednesday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2IcQtRE
